normalized: on november 10.
twelve days after our departure from perseus city.
the battleship, tristan, arrived safely in libra.
beatrice and i were waiting for a man at the libra space-station.
general william ahle moller of the neo-terras.
i had planned to capture him, after having lured him in by using beatrice as bait.
i had already notified the senile yet lustful old man that the brainwashing process on beatrice had been completed.
i had placed both my arms behind my back as i was pretending to be beatrice’s prisoner, which was all just a sham.
however, i wanted to make it seem like it was beatrice who had called moller, after capturing me.
it was all a scheme to help the old man, and beatrice’s husband, lucius romanoff―― the new face of hope.
with that, i would be able to increase the debt of gratitude that lucius romanoff owed me.

name: beatrice
normalized: haa…
beatrice looked to be back to her original self, now that she had been administered with drugs in order to block her nerves from carrying pleasure signals, as she let out a drawn-out sigh.
however, even though her entire body was no longer being tormented by pleasure, her personality was still the one which i had created for her.

name: bohgan
normalized: what is the matter?
why are you sighing?

name: beatrice
normalized: no.
it is nothing.
beatrice said so, however, it was quite apparent that she was disgruntled.
it was almost as if the woman was sulking.

name: bohgan
normalized: kukukuku… are you so annoyed because lucius romanoff is going to take credit for this?

name: beatrice
normalized: obviously.
i want to work for you.
not for the sake of a shitty man like that――

name: beatrice
normalized: that man… i hope he falls dead right this instant.
she whispered that last part to herself.
hatred was oozing out of her.
her body trembled as she felt a woman’s grudge on being forced to marry herself into a loveless affair, even though i was the one who had created her personality, as well as, these memories of hers.

name: bohgan
normalized: i will end up in a bother if he does die now.

name: bohgan
normalized: it will “extend” my reach over the universe.

beatrice?

name: beatrice
normalized: i understand.
however, can i make one request?

name: beatrice
normalized: i understand that you will be swapping places with him in the near future.
i will put my own life on the line as well, if you need it for the sake of extending your reach over the universe.

name: beatrice
normalized: however, even though you will merely be donning a different face, please let me recognize your face as it is now.

name: beatrice
normalized: use hypnotism or brainwashing or whatever else is needed for it, however, seeing that man’s face on you would just make me want to die.
please, darling.
beatrice had a face which was almost on the verge of crying.
i see.
it was one of my favourite tricks to don a different face.
however, i hadn’t taken into account what feelings this woman, who was madly in love with me, would have about it.

i will make it so that you can see my real face.
